name: Flora LMS
author: ispringsolutions

sections.description: Flora LMS Plugin lets you easily import your content from Flora LMS to your WordPress site. Additionally, you can add a button to sign in to Flora LMS with your WordPress login details. Use the ‘Transport::add_go_to_flora_lms’ link to allow users to sign in to your Flora account.
sections.installation:
1. If you install plugin manually, run ‘composer install’ in plugin folder
  2. Activate the plugin in the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to your Flora LMS account to configure the JWT settings. To access the JWT settings go to https://yourdomain.floralms.com/settings/sso/jwt
  4. Fill in the field ‘Identity provider URL’ with your login action e.g. https://example/wp-login.php?action=login
  5. Fill in the field ‘Logout URL’ with your logout action e.g. https://example/wp-login.php?action=logout
  6. Go to the admin page of the Flora LMS plugin.
  7. Paste your secret key and the domain name of your Flora LMS account.
  8. After that, you can import your courses by clicking on ‘Update courses’
sections.faq:
How can I get my Flora LMS platform

You are welcome to get a free 14-day trial of Flora LMS at https://www.floralms.com/trial to test all of its features.
